properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(PRO_CODE) AS "listCount" FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRO_CODE , PRO_CATEGORY_NAME , PRO_NAME , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '99,999') AS "PRICE" , PRO_ENROLL_DATE , PRO_IMG_PATH , PRO_COUNT FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRO_CATEGORY ON (CATEGORY_NO = PRO_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY PRO_CODE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT PRO_CODE , PRO_CATEGORY_NAME , PRO_NAME , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '99,999') "PRICE" , PRO_ENROLL_DATE , PRO_IMG_PATH , PRO_COUNT FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRO_CATEGORY ON (CATEGORY_NO = PRO_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY PRO_COUNT DESC, PRO_NAME ASC ) A ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
